name: ARX
introduce: ARX is a fully decentralized and self-custody P2P fiat ramp protocol designed to focus on "moderator-free/centralized party free" user protection mechanisms. . On the platform there are two primary actors - vendors and customers. Vendors create offers on the platform, and making profits mostly from arbitrage with common crypto markets (CEXes, DEXes, etc). Customers are regular users who want to buy/sell crypto for fiat quickly.
